roleset.name: engage in sexual relations, having been the recipient of sexual relations

FUCK-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on WN noun sense 1. No VNcls. (from fuck.01-n)

example.name: no args, but true to sense
example.text: Maybe he asked her for a fuck, maybe for money but she refused.

example.text: Clint Eastwood: ?I don't give a fuck about who wants to get married to anybody else! ..."

example.text: It makes me even more pissed off knowing the money I did n't WANT to pay went to these dumb fucks .

example.name: Both args. Sorry.
example.text: His fuck of Annabelle Cornfield was to be his last.

roleset.name: botch, mess up, make a hash of, short for 'fuck up', screwed up

example.name: multiple blue words at once
example.text: [Lousy Reactionary bastards]-1 been tryin [*-1]to fuck up the Program for months.

example.name: arg0
example.text: I effed up , took the train too far . Missed my lab and heading back to Philly feeling defeated

roleset.name: go away and leave me alone

example.text: ``Ah, [*] fuck off,'' said Mary to John.

roleset.name: screw around, goof off, not be serious (could also be sexual)

role.descr: entity screwed around with, non-serious activity

example.text: Fuckin around on twitter , reading " an arsonist s guide to writers homes in New England " by Brock Clarke -LRB- horrible name-RRB- and finishing my laundry .
